section.title: About event programs
section.para: Single event without registration programs are called event programs. You configure them in the Maintenance app. Event programs can have three types of data entry forms:

table.title: Types of data entry forms for event programs

entry.para: Lists all data elements which belong to the program. You can change the order of the data elements.
A section groups data elements. You can then arrange the order of the sections to create the desired layout of the data entry form.
Defines the data entry form as HTML page.

listitem.para: Custom forms takes precedence over section forms if both are present.
If no custom or section form are defined, the basic form will be used.
The Android apps only supports section forms.

section.para: You can create program notifications for event programs. The notifications are sent either via the internal DHIS2 messaging system, via e-mail or via text messages (SMS). You can use program notifications to, for example, send an automatic reminder to a tracked entity 10 days before a scheduled appointment. You use the programâ€™s tracked entity attributes (for example first name) and program parameters (for example enrollment date) to create a notification template. In the Parameters field, you'll find a list of available tracked entity attributes and program parameters.
